Sri Venugopalaswami Temple

Tirupati | Andhra Pradesh | India

4 /5 222 Votes

Quick facts of Sri Venugopalaswami Temple

Ideal Duration: 15-45 minutes

Best Time: Throughout the year

Accessability:

Nearest Airport: Vijayawada, Rajiv Gandhi International

Nearest Railway Station: Hyderabad, Visakhapatnam

/ India / Andhra Pradesh / Tirupati / Sri Venugopalaswami Temple

Sri Venugopalaswami Temple, Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh

A Hindu-Vaishnavite temple, dedicated to Lord Krishna, the ninth incarnation of Vishnu's Dashavatharam, reffered as Venugopala is Sri Venugopalaswamy Temple.

A Hindu-Vaishnavite temple situated at Karvetinagaram in Andhra Pradesh State, dedicated to Lord Krishna, the ninth incarnation of Vishnu's Dashavatharam, who is referred to as Venugopala is Sri Venugopalaswamy Temple. The Garbhagriha hosts Venugopalaswamy along with his consorts Rukmini and Satyabhama. The deities were brought from Narayanavanam Temple. There are sub-shrines dedicated to Rama along with Sita and Lakshmana, Anjaneya, Parthasarathy, Renuka parameshwari, and Avanakshamma. The temple pond is referred to as Skanda Pushkarini.Daily rituals are held as per Vaikanasa Agama. Temple celebrates Krishna Janmastami, Utlotsavam, Brahmotsavams, Vaikuntha Ekadoshi, Ugadi and Sankranti.
